metadata.title: CVE-2023-29547 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: When a secure cookie existed in the Firefox cookie jar an insecure cookiefor the same domain could have been created, when it should have silentlyfailed. This could have led to a desynchronization in expected results whenreading from the secure cookie. This vulnerability affects Firefox forAndroid < 112, Firefox < 112, and Focus for Android < 112.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
